tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name STRING, instructions STRING, rating FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
  recipe_id UUID,
  ingredient_id UUID,
  quantity FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (recipe_id, ingredient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_ingredients (
recipe_id INT,
ingredient_id INT,
PRIMARY KEY (recipe_id, ingredient_id),
FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes (recipe_id),
FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients (ingredient_id)
);
recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name STRING, instructions STRING)
ingredients (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name STRING)
recipe_ingredients (recipe_id INT, ingredient_id INT, quantity FLOAT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id))
categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name STRING)
recipe_categories (recipe_id INT, category_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id))
